topic.title: TVEpisodes.bit is no longer updating since 8/26/17
topic.body:
This is just a message to the owner of http://127.0.0.1:43110/tvepisodes.bit to have them fix the site if possible.  it seems the last post to the site is stuck inserting the freenet link.

08/26/2017, 09:00	6EF0A93550B7BE10480C0DD1399B57A97CD78A7E	inserting...	Rambo.S01.AMZN.WEBRip.DDP2.0.x264-BTW[rartv]
Hopefully the owner can see this and possibly get the site up and running again.

1_18U3XMxdYnD8BFVeY6UCPJvKTLg51n4uBZ.body: Yeah, not sure how I would begin to collaborate, or what exactly I would have to offer.  I just wanted to inform someone of the issue.  Thank you to whoever read this and got it working again.
